title: The Launch: Fashion News to Know This March
text: With March comes the hope of spring and many, many new clothes, bags, and shoes via Paris Fashion Week. Whether on the runways or in stores, the month promises an exciting new season of collaborations, exhibitions, openings…the list goes on. When it comes to fashion and all of the above, we’ve gathered everything you need to know this March, starting with a collaboration between Cecilie Bahnsen and The North Face. Courtesy of Cecilie BahnsenWho: Cecilie Bahnsen and The North Face What: Collaborative capsule collectionWhere: Online at ceciliebahnsen.com and thenorthface.com, as well as select The North Face retail locationsWhy: Cecilie Bahnsen and The North Face have paired together to release their first collaboration. The collaboration was first presented at Cecilie Bahnsen's SS25 runway show in September and since then, has been highly anticipated to shop. The seven-piece collection encapsulates the brand's aesthetics, combining the high performance fabrics and technical finishes from The North Face with more fashion-forward and feminine silhouettes from Cecilie Bahnsen. Cecilie Bahnsen x The North Face Fiona Short Mountain JacketCredit: Courtesy of Cecilie Bahnsen Cecilie Bahnsen x The North Face Shara Mountain DressCredit: Courtesy of Cecilie Bahnsen Cecilie Bahnsen x The North Face Charlotte Glenclyffe Gaiter BootsCredit: Courtesy of Cecilie Bahnsen Brunello Cucinelli Releases BC Duo Handbag CollectionSabrina Steck/BFA.com Who: Brunello CucinelliWhat: New handbag collectionWhere: Online at brunellocucinelli.comWhy: Brunello Cucinelli celebrated the launch of the BC Duo handbag collection with a cocktail party hosted by co-designers of the new style, Carolina and Camilla Cucinelli, in New York City. The collection of leather and suede tote bags combines the sleek aesthetic of the brand with the practicality of the modern woman and is available in a range of the brand’s signature neutral palette and in large, small, and mini sizes. Brunello Cucinelli BC Duo Large Bag in SuedeBrunello Cucinelli BC Duo Bag in CalfskinBrunello Cucinelli BC Duo Bag in CalfskinTommy Hilfiger Announces Collaboration With Sofia Richie GraingeCourtesy, Tommy HilfigerWho: Tommy Hilfiger and Sofia Richie GraingeWhat: Collaborative capsule collectionWhere: Online at tommy.com, at Tommy Hilfiger stores worldwide, and at select Macy’s storesWhy: Sofia Richie Grainge, who’s been a Tommy Hilfiger ambassador since June 2024, is now also the brand’s latest collaborator. In their first co-designed capsule, Sofia for Tommy, the model and tastemaker’s elevated style shines through in 24 pieces, from tailored blazers to refined dresses. The capsule is inspired by the brand’s archives, mixing prep and nautical style, as well as Grainge’s own effortless elegance that has made her the poster girl for understated luxury.Sofia for Tommy Double-Breasted BlazerSofia for Tommy Sleeveless Stripe DressSofia for Tommy Colorblock Stripe SweaterProenza Schouler Opens New Flagship Store in SoHo Courtesy of Proenza SchoulerWho: Proenza Schouler What: Flagship openingWhere: SoHo, New York CityWhy: Proenza Schouler has opened a flagship store in the heart of SoHo. The gallery-like interior reflects much of the brand’s aesthetics, greeting its customers with sleek, clean decor. One of the store’s more prominent features: the four cube-like structures made from resin and stone, each containing fitting rooms. Proenza Schouler Proenza Schouler Days Tote in Natural Linen- Natural / BlackCredit: Courtesy of Proenza SchoulerProenza Schouler Proenza Schouler Selene Dress in Bi-Stretch Suiting- BlackCredit: Courtesy of Proenza Schouler Proenza Schouler Proenza Schouler Tee Thong Sandals in Slick Nappa- BlackCredit: Courtesy of Proenza Schouler Extreme Cashmere and Miele Create Pop-Up Clothing Spacourtesy of Extreme CashmereWho: Extreme Cashmere and MieleWhat: CollaborationWhere: ParisWhy: Extreme Cashmere and Miele partnered to host their first-ever cashmere spa during Paris Fashion Week. The duo hope to inform customers about the correct processes for taking care of cashmere and the importance of doing so in order to preserve a piece’s quality and construction. Extreme Cashmere Extreme Cashmere Short-Sleeved Cardigan Petite FlyerCredit: Courtesy of Extreme CashmereExtreme Cashmere Extreme Cashmere High-Neck Tank Top – 412 wieverCredit: Courtesy of Extreme CashmereExtreme Cashmere Extreme Cashmere Midi Circle Skirt Elegant – 313 twirlCredit: Courtesy of Extreme CashmereLeSportsac Announces Collaboration With Roberto CavalliCourtesy, LeSportsac x Roberto CavalliWho: LeSportsac and Roberto CavalliWhat: New collaborative collectionWhere: Available at Neiman Marcus, LeSportsac and Roberto Cavalli stores globally and online at both robertocavalli.com and lesportsac.comWhy: LeSportsac released a new collaborative collection with Italian brand Roberto Cavalli, combining the two brands’ signature components: lightweight sportiness and bold animal prints. The spring 2025 debut includes four handbag styles designed in a partnership between LeSportsac creative director Luca Schmitz and Roberto Cavalli creative director Fausto Puglisi. The styles are edgy and chic, and perfect for a moment where animal print is everywhere, from the runways to street style. Prices will range from $295 to $525. LeSportsac x Roberto Cavalli Venezia Medium BagLeSportsac x Roberto Cavalli Roma BagLeSportsac x Roberto Cavalli Bologna Medium BagMarimekko Drops New Artist Capsule Collection With Petra BörnerCourtesy, MarimekkoWho: Marimekko and Petra BörnerWhat: New artist collaborationWhere: Available online at marimekko.com Why: Finnish brand Marimekko announced the latest collaboration in the Marimekko Artist Series, which bridges art and fashion by inviting artists to co-create limited-edition ready-to-wear collections. The latest to be announced is London-based Swedish artist Petra Börner, who created four exclusive artworks, printed onto Marimekko’s signature silhouettes, from dresses to homeware. Available to shop beginning March 10, Börner’s vibrant colors and floral shapes are a natural addition to Marimekko’s already light, bright aesthetic. Marimekko Piirros Cactis Jersey TopMarimekko Kukkavera Eldfamn Cotton ShirtMarimekko Helmi Baluns Placement DressManolo Blahnik Launches Capsule Collection Alongside New Miami BoutiqueCourtesy of Brett Warren for Manolo BlahnikWho: Manolo BlahnikWhat: Capsule collection and new boutiqueWhere: Miami Design DistrictWhy: Manolo Blahnik will open its first Miami location this month in the heart of the city’s Design District. With the opening, a new capsule collection will drop, featuring 13 store-exclusive styles in bold colorways inspired by the vibrant ethos of Miami. The store itself was designed in geometric black and white, highlighting the colorful shoes and bags that are sure to be staples for the summer. Manolo Blahnik Hodouby Linen Slingback PumpsManolo Blahnik Chastana Nappa Leather Bow Detail SandalsManolo Blahnik Gibsli Suede Pearl Buckle Slingback PumpsFernando Jorge Opens Jewelry Showroom in New York CityCourtesy, Fernando JorgeWho: Fernando JorgeWhat: New showroom and by-appointment-only boutiqueWhere: New York CityWhy: Brazilian-born, London-based jeweler Fernando Jorge opened his first New York City showroom this week, marking a new chapter for the brand. Designed by Andre Mellone of Studio Mellone, the showroom features artwork by fellow Brazilians Daniel Steegmann Mangrané and Paulo Monteiro and furniture by Brazilian designer Juliana Vasconcellos. The space, designed with a serene green hue signature to the brand, will be open to clients by appointment only. html:
With March comes the hope of spring and many, many new clothes, bags, and shoes via Paris Fashion Week. Whether on the runways or in stores, the month promises an exciting new season of collaborations, exhibitions, openings…the list goes on. When it comes to fashion and all of the above, we’ve gathered everything you need to know this March, starting with a collaboration between Cecilie Bahnsen and The North Face.

Who: Cecilie Bahnsen and The North Face

What: Collaborative capsule collection

Where: Online at ceciliebahnsen.com and thenorthface.com, as well as select The North Face retail locations

Why: Cecilie Bahnsen and The North Face have paired together to release their first collaboration. The collaboration was first presented at Cecilie Bahnsen's SS25 runway show in September and since then, has been highly anticipated to shop. The seven-piece collection encapsulates the brand's aesthetics, combining the high performance fabrics and technical finishes from The North Face with more fashion-forward and feminine silhouettes from Cecilie Bahnsen.

Cecilie Bahnsen x The North Face Fiona Short Mountain Jacket

Cecilie Bahnsen x The North Face Shara Mountain Dress

Cecilie Bahnsen x The North Face Charlotte Glenclyffe Gaiter Boots

Brunello Cucinelli Releases BC Duo Handbag Collection

Who: Brunello Cucinelli

What: New handbag collection

Where: Online at brunellocucinelli.com

Why: Brunello Cucinelli celebrated the launch of the BC Duo handbag collection with a cocktail party hosted by co-designers of the new style, Carolina and Camilla Cucinelli, in New York City. The collection of leather and suede tote bags combines the sleek aesthetic of the brand with the practicality of the modern woman and is available in a range of the brand’s signature neutral palette and in large, small, and mini sizes.

Brunello Cucinelli BC Duo Large Bag in Suede

Brunello Cucinelli BC Duo Bag in Calfskin

Brunello Cucinelli BC Duo Bag in Calfskin

Tommy Hilfiger Announces Collaboration With Sofia Richie Grainge

Who: Tommy Hilfiger and Sofia Richie Grainge

What: Collaborative capsule collection

Where: Online at tommy.com, at Tommy Hilfiger stores worldwide, and at select Macy’s stores

Why: Sofia Richie Grainge, who’s been a Tommy Hilfiger ambassador since June 2024, is now also the brand’s latest collaborator. In their first co-designed capsule, Sofia for Tommy, the model and tastemaker’s elevated style shines through in 24 pieces, from tailored blazers to refined dresses. The capsule is inspired by the brand’s archives, mixing prep and nautical style, as well as Grainge’s own effortless elegance that has made her the poster girl for understated luxury.

Sofia for Tommy Double-Breasted Blazer

Sofia for Tommy Sleeveless Stripe Dress

Sofia for Tommy Colorblock Stripe Sweater

Proenza Schouler Opens New Flagship Store in SoHo

Who: Proenza Schouler

What: Flagship opening

Where: SoHo, New York City

Why: Proenza Schouler has opened a flagship store in the heart of SoHo. The gallery-like interior reflects much of the brand’s aesthetics, greeting its customers with sleek, clean decor. One of the store’s more prominent features: the four cube-like structures made from resin and stone, each containing fitting rooms.

Proenza Schouler Proenza Schouler Days Tote in Natural Linen- Natural / Black

Proenza Schouler Proenza Schouler Selene Dress in Bi-Stretch Suiting- Black

Proenza Schouler Proenza Schouler Tee Thong Sandals in Slick Nappa- Black

Extreme Cashmere and Miele Create Pop-Up Clothing Spa

Who: Extreme Cashmere and Miele

What: Collaboration

Where: Paris

Why: Extreme Cashmere and Miele partnered to host their first-ever cashmere spa during Paris Fashion Week. The duo hope to inform customers about the correct processes for taking care of cashmere and the importance of doing so in order to preserve a piece’s quality and construction.

Extreme Cashmere Extreme Cashmere Short-Sleeved Cardigan Petite Flyer

Extreme Cashmere Extreme Cashmere High-Neck Tank Top – 412 wiever

Extreme Cashmere Extreme Cashmere Midi Circle Skirt Elegant – 313 twirl

LeSportsac Announces Collaboration With Roberto Cavalli

Who: LeSportsac and Roberto Cavalli

What: New collaborative collection

Where: Available at Neiman Marcus, LeSportsac and Roberto Cavalli stores globally and online at both robertocavalli.com and lesportsac.com

Why: LeSportsac released a new collaborative collection with Italian brand Roberto Cavalli, combining the two brands’ signature components: lightweight sportiness and bold animal prints. The spring 2025 debut includes four handbag styles designed in a partnership between LeSportsac creative director Luca Schmitz and Roberto Cavalli creative director Fausto Puglisi. The styles are edgy and chic, and perfect for a moment where animal print is everywhere, from the runways to street style. Prices will range from $295 to $525.

LeSportsac x Roberto Cavalli Venezia Medium Bag

LeSportsac x Roberto Cavalli Roma Bag

LeSportsac x Roberto Cavalli Bologna Medium Bag

Marimekko Drops New Artist Capsule Collection With Petra Börner

Who: Marimekko and Petra Börner

What: New artist collaboration

Where: Available online at marimekko.com

Why: Finnish brand Marimekko announced the latest collaboration in the Marimekko Artist Series, which bridges art and fashion by inviting artists to co-create limited-edition ready-to-wear collections. The latest to be announced is London-based Swedish artist Petra Börner, who created four exclusive artworks, printed onto Marimekko’s signature silhouettes, from dresses to homeware. Available to shop beginning March 10, Börner’s vibrant colors and floral shapes are a natural addition to Marimekko’s already light, bright aesthetic.

Marimekko Piirros Cactis Jersey Top

Marimekko Kukkavera Eldfamn Cotton Shirt

Marimekko Helmi Baluns Placement Dress

Manolo Blahnik Launches Capsule Collection Alongside New Miami Boutique

Who: Manolo Blahnik

What: Capsule collection and new boutique

Where: Miami Design District

Why: Manolo Blahnik will open its first Miami location this month in the heart of the city’s Design District. With the opening, a new capsule collection will drop, featuring 13 store-exclusive styles in bold colorways inspired by the vibrant ethos of Miami. The store itself was designed in geometric black and white, highlighting the colorful shoes and bags that are sure to be staples for the summer.

Manolo Blahnik Hodouby Linen Slingback Pumps

Manolo Blahnik Chastana Nappa Leather Bow Detail Sandals

Manolo Blahnik Gibsli Suede Pearl Buckle Slingback Pumps

Fernando Jorge Opens Jewelry Showroom in New York City

Who: Fernando Jorge

What: New showroom and by-appointment-only boutique

Where: New York City

Why: Brazilian-born, London-based jeweler Fernando Jorge opened his first New York City showroom this week, marking a new chapter for the brand. Designed by Andre Mellone of Studio Mellone, the showroom features artwork by fellow Brazilians Daniel Steegmann Mangrané and Paulo Monteiro and furniture by Brazilian designer Juliana Vasconcellos. The space, designed with a serene green hue signature to the brand, will be open to clients by appointment only.

Fernando Jorge Stream Lines Loop Earrings

Now 89% Off

Fernando Jorge Signal Earrings

Fernando Jorge Orbit Diamond and Petrified Wood Statement Ring
